name: Frostmaul E'ko
tooltip:
Frostmaul E'ko

In Winterspring, you have fought da large ice giants called frostmaul. Sheer power and force is at their disposal. If you wish ta gain da force of da frostmaul, bring me da E'ko you find from dem.

Rememba, you must have the Cache of Mau'ari in your inventory if you want ta hunt for E'ko.

Requirements:
- Frostmaul E'ko x 3
